onServiceDisconnected(int).Description: Called to notify the client that this proxy object has been disconnected from the service.

onServiceConnected(int,android.bluetooth.Description: Called to notify the client when the proxy object has been connected to the service.
onServiceConnected(int,android.bluetooth.FullName: public abstract void onServiceConnected (int profile, BluetoothProfile proxy)

ClassDesc: An interface for notifying BluetoothProfile IPC clients when they have been connected or disconnected to the service.
